attributes.action: Make English Pool an Olympic Sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to bring to your attention; that one of the greatest highly skilled and tactical games in this world Pool is not an Olympic Sport! Hard for you to believe i know but it is a shocking fact that you may or may not have realized! So i may be a little optimistic to think this petition may have a world wide impact! but for those that want this to be changed, lets try and make a difference in the world today!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
